ygData.subject: Re: Twinking was -> Blackened Iron Armor *SPOILER*  (sort of)
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe I read too much into it, but the rants on twinking started as a reply to one of the people suggesting that he sell it and buy decent equipment. To me
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe I read too much into it, but the rants on twinking started as a reply to
one of the people suggesting that he sell it and buy decent equipment. To me
that sounds like people are saying he'll be a twink if he goes out and sells the
crown to buy decent armor and equipment instead of hoarding it in the bank until
he is of the "appropriate" level to go and kill the King in runnyeye.

Just my 2cp,
Taelin

> From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
>
> Uhhmmm I don't think anyone contested this particular fellow aquiring of
> the item. If fact a good amount of advice was spawn from his question.
> What your seeing now is not the evaluation of him twinking, rather it has
> evolved into a debate about the merits of twinking. This thread spawned
> due to the two courses of actions suggested by the list. If you look back
> you will find that at no time did we accuse him twinking though we were
> all a bit envious =). I guess it is time to shange the topic.
>
> Treilanin Loreweaver
